name: fsound4
short_description:
fsound4 is a python library for sound generation/processing. it aims to be simple and flexible. speed is not a goal, real-time rendering is not a goal. it should be easily extensible and the classes/methods should lend themselves to as many applications as possible.

sequencers and tools for creating generative/aleatoric music may be added at some stage, but the focus for now is synthesis and DSP.
